definition: to excuse sb/to exempt/to remove or dismiss from office/to avoid/to avert/to escape/to be prohibited
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: He never passed this man without giving him a few sous .
sentences.chinese: 他從那人面前走過，總免不了要給他幾個蘇。

sentences.english: I am firm with each, the pangs are sharp yet unavoidable.
sentences.chinese: 我對每個人都不馬虎，因爲劇痛雖厲害，可是免不了。

sentences.english: No matter how high the stars are playing, they all exposed unavoidably.
sentences.chinese: 看來不管多大牌的明星，都免不了走光啊。

sentences.english: If you undertake the project, you are bound to encounter difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 如果你承接這項工程的話，免不了會遇到許多困難。

sentences.english: The party defeated the helmet of rejected will inevitably, flying for lost.
sentences.chinese: 廝殺結果，打敗的一方免不了會棄盔丟甲，飛奔逃命。

sentences.english: I don't think that speeder will be able to beat this rap .
sentences.chinese: 我認爲那個違章超速駕駛者免不了要受罰。

sentences.english: And you, Mr. Veteran, you must have been often wounded?
sentences.chinese: 您呢，退伍軍人先生，您總免不了要常常掛點彩吧。

sentences.english: I went to the beach, and I couldn't stop staring at the hot guys' pecs .
sentences.chinese: 我到海灘上總免不了要盯着看健美男士的胸肌。

sentences.english: It is not practical to fit the piston to the cylinder closely enough to prevent blow-by.
sentences.chinese: 實際上，活塞與氣缸間再嚴密也免不了會漏氣。

sentences.english: Feeling of longing for motherland brings more negative effects.
sentences.chinese: 鄉思鄉情也免不了給人們帶來多方面的消極作用。

sentences.english: Royal weddings always did constitute big news story status, of course, but your average blueblood marrying someone not too far from a second cousin twice removed has nothing on this.
sentences.chinese: 皇室婚禮免不了鋪天蓋地的新聞渲染，但是？

sentences.english: This is often true in the Lord's work.
sentences.chinese: 凡爲主工作的人，都總免不了遭人反對。

sentences.english: Chu Xiangshi inevitably be reflected in the restrained and careful.
sentences.chinese: 初相識，免不了的是矜持和小心翼翼。
愛情從來免不了多愁善感。

sentences.english: Dry seasons are inevitable if we neglect the spiritual exercises.
sentences.chinese: 若我們輕忽屬靈的操練，就免不了屬靈的乾旱。

sentences.english: Hongfei's mother was not so well, going to hospital now and then for treatment or medicine.
sentences.chinese: 紅飛的母親一直有病，免不了常到縣醫院看病拿藥。

definition: hard to avoid/difficult to escape from/will inevitably
cannot do without/to be unavoidable/are bound to be many
more likely than not/quite possible/on the cards
to be bound to/to be sure to
see 未可厚非[wei4 ke3 hou4 fei1]
most likely/mostly (in 8 or 9 cases out of 10)/vast majority
